items.title: Awesome Vue Updates on Aug 19, 2024
items.content_text:
### Resources / Podcasts

*   [DejaVue - The Vue podcast to remember](https://dejavue.fm/)

### Resources / Examples

*   [umo editor (‚≠ê976)](https://github.com/umodoc/editor) - Umo Editor is an open-source document editor, based on Vue3 and Tiptap. Visit [Playground](https://demo.umodoc.com/editor?lang=en-US) for a fast experience.

### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [navpress (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/aaronlamz/navpress) - NavPress is a CLI tool for generating static navigation websites. It allows you to quickly build a navigation site through a configuration file.
*   [vue-speedometer (‚≠ê63)](https://github.com/palerdot/vue-speedometer) - Vue component for showing speedometer like gauge using d3.
*   [Vue-Player (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/display-design-studio/vue-player) - Lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-implement vue video player.
*   [vue3-select-component (‚≠ê86)](https://github.com/TotomInc/vue3-select-component) - Vue 3 Select Component, single & multi-select, best-in-class DX support with TypeScript end-to-end typesafe, easy styling, slots and more \~4.4KB

### Components & Libraries / Scaffold

*   [mevn-boilerplate (‚≠ê235)](https://github.com/mustafacagri/mevn-boilerplate) - ‚≠êÔ∏è the most comprehensive mevn stack boilerplate. ‚≠êÔ∏è mongodb - express - vue 3 (admin dashboard) - nodejs - nuxt 3 (client) boilerplate (pinia, tiptap, slug, vuetify and vuexy and more...) üéâ

### Components & Libraries / Frameworks

[Live demo](https://themeselection.com/demo/materio-vuetify-vuejs-admin-template-free/demo/dashboard)

### Components & Libraries / UI Layout

*   [vue-grid-layout (‚≠ê7.3k)](https://github.com/jbaysolutions/vue-grid-layout) - A draggable and resizable grid layout, for Vue.js.

*   [vue-typed-virtual-list (‚≠ê40)](https://github.com/bsssshhhhhhh/vue-typed-virtual-list) - \[Vue 3.x] small, efficient, TypeScript-friendly virtual scroller for rendering massive data
*   [fit-screen (‚≠ê81)](https://github.com/jp-liu/fit-screen) - A vue component based on the scale large screen adaptive solution.
*   [vue-virtual-waterfall (‚≠ê180)](https://github.com/lhlyu/vue-virtual-waterfall) - A virtual waterfall component for Vue 3.x.
*   [vue-stack-grid (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/chiribuc/vue-stack-grid) - A Vue 3 component designed to make creating dynamic, responsive grid layouts easy and efficient.
items.content_html:

  • AT-UI - A fresh and flat UI-Kit specially for desktop application, made with ‚ô• by Vue.js 2.0
  • BootstrapVue (‚≠ê15k) - Bootstrap v4 components and grid system for Vue.js.
  • fish-ui - A Vue.js 2.0 UI Toolkit for Web
  • zircle-ui (‚≠ê949) - A frontend library to develop zoomable user interfaces.
  • ant-design-vue (‚≠ê21k) - An enterprise-class UI components based on Ant Design and Vue 3.2.0
  • heyui (‚≠ê2.6k) - (https://www.heyui.top/en) - A Vue.js 2.0 UI Toolkit for Web.
  • Carvue.js - IBM's Carbon Design System for Vue.js
  • BalmUI (‚≠ê510) - A modular and customizable UI library based on Material Design and Vue 3.0
  • Osiris UI - üé® A Vue.js 2.0 universal responsive UI component library
  • @Carbon/vue (‚≠ê627) - Carbon Design System components from the @carbon team.
  • Inkline (‚≠ê1.4k) - Inkline is the intuitive UI Components library that gives you a developer-friendly foundation for building Vue.js 3 Design Systems.
  • MDBootstrap (‚≠ê967) - Powerful UI toolkit based on the latest Bootstrap 4 and Vue 2.6.10, providing a set of slick, responsive page templates, layouts, components and widgets to rapidly build responsive, mobile-first websites and apps.

  • vue-smooth-dnd (‚≠ê1.8k) - Vue wrappers of smooth-dnd library. drag and drop, sortable library covering for many cases.
  • v-distpicker (‚≠ê979) A flexible, highly available district picker for picking provinces, cities and districts of China for Vue.js 2.x.
  • v-image (‚≠ê40) üì∑ Tiny little component for input type=file (< 1kb, gzipped)
  • radial-color-picker (‚≠ê101) - Minimalistic color picker with a focus on size, accessibility and performance.
  • vue-froala-wysiwyg (‚≠ê647) - Official VueJS plugin for Froala WYSIWIG HTML Editor.
  • vue-trix (‚≠ê249) - Simple and lightweight Trix rich-text editor for Vue.js
  • tiptap (‚≠ê31k) - A renderless and extendable rich-text editor for Vue.js
  • ckeditor5-vue (‚≠ê376) - An official CKEditor 5 rich text editor component for Vue.js.
  • vue-cropper (‚≠ê4.5k) - A picture clipping plugin for vue2.0
  • vue-croppie (‚≠ê261) - Yet another image cropper
  • vue-advanced-cropper (‚≠ê1.1k) - An advanced cropper that gives you opportunity to create almost any cropper that you desire
  • vue-upload-component (‚≠ê2.7k) - Vue upload component, Multi-file upload, Upload directory, Drag upload, Drag the directory. Supports Vue >= 2.0
  • vue-simple-context-menu (‚≠ê238) - Simple context-menu component built for Vue. Works well with both left and right clicks.
  • vue-poll (‚≠ê133) - A Vue.js component for voting
  • vue-diagrams (‚≠ê295) - Diagram component for vue.js, inspired by react-diagrams
  • vue-simple-password-meter (‚≠ê101) - Lightweight password strength meter with no dependency
  • vue-stepper-component (‚≠ê112) - A fully customizable Stepper component with Vuex support and Zero dependencies.
  • vue-konva (‚≠ê1.3k) - Vue & Canvas - JavaScript library for drawing complex canvas graphics using Vue.
  • link-prevue (‚≠ê245) - Flexible component for generate a link preview.

Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

  • vue-global-events (‚≠ê696) ‚Äì A component to handle global events (like shortcuts) using Vue‚Äôs event modifiers
  • vue-tabevents (‚≠ê33) ‚Äì Easy communication between other opened tabs
  • vue-responsive (‚≠ê100): Vue.js(2.x) directive to hide/show HTML-elements with the Bootstrap 4, 3 or self defined breakpoints.
  • Form Builder (‚≠ê123) - Json template based form builder, based on Vue and Laravel.
  • vue-autofocus-directive (‚≠ê33) - Vue autofocus directive.
  • vee-validate (‚≠ê11k) - Simple Vue.js input validation plugin.
  • vuelidate (‚≠ê6.9k) - Simple, lightweight model-based validation for Vue.js.
  • vue-final-validate - Vue validation solution from my development experience, support nested, async.
  • vue-not-visible (‚≠ê22) - Vue directive for removing from dom (like v-if) element on screen smaller than breakpoints.
  • vuescroll (‚≠ê1.3k) - A scrolling plugin based on Vue.js for uniforming the scrolling in PC and mobile.
  • vue-router (‚≠ê19k) - The official router for Vue.js.
  • laravel-vue-semantic-ui-pagination (‚≠ê8) - A Vue.js 2.x pagination used with Laravel & Semantic-UI.
  • vue-paginate-al (‚≠ê51) - Vue paginate with return your data.
  • vue-tiny-pagination (‚≠ê19) - A Vue component for create a tiny pagination.
  • laravel-vue-pagination (‚≠ê752) - A Vue.js pagination component for Laravel paginators that works with Bootstrap.
  • vue-lpage (‚≠ê5) - Low-level Vue pagination component.
  • v-page (‚≠ê100) - A simple pagination bar, including length Menu, i18n support, based on Vue2.x.
  • v-odometer (‚≠ê100) - Smoothly transitions numbers with ease. Use this library to give your application a smooth animation, only applicable on numbers.
  • vue-slide-up-down (‚≠ê202) Like jQuery's slideUp / slideDown, but for Vue!
  • vue-kinesis (‚≠ê1.5k) A set of components to create interactive animations
  • vue-svgicon (‚≠ê918) - A tool to create svg icon components. (vue 2.x).

Components & Libraries / Utilities

  • vue-async-computed (‚≠ê1.1k) - Async computed properties for Vue.js.
  • vue-api-query (‚≠ê1.7k) - Elegant and simple way to build requests for REST API.
  • vue-i18n (‚≠ê7.3k) - Internationalization plugin for Vue.js.
  • vscode-vue-i18n-ally (‚≠ê4.5k) - VSCode extension for better Vue-i18n experiences.
  • vue-option-events (‚≠ê5) - Bring Vue.js 1 events option and $emit to Vue.js 2.
  • vue2-storage (‚≠ê112) Browser storage for Vue.js app
  • effector (‚≠ê4.7k) ‚Äî Fast and powerful reactive state manager. Effector lets you write simple, fast and type safe code and manage reactive state with ease.
  • vue-auth-href (‚≠ê17) - A VueJS directive for downloading files that are under a protected route schema
  • jsonapi-vuex (‚≠ê156) - Use a JSONAPI api with a Vuex store, with client-side restructuring/normalization of records.
  • vue-apollo (‚≠ê6.1k) - Apollo/GraphQL integration for VueJS.
  • vue-types (‚≠ê578) - Vue Prop Types definitions.
  • eslint-plugin-vue (‚≠ê4.5k) - Eslint plugin for Vue.js projects.
  • fela-vue (‚≠ê7) - CSS-IN-JS mixin for Vue designed for flexibility yet team-oriented.
  • vue-loader (‚≠ê5k) - Webpack loader for Vue.js components.
  • vue-jsx-hot-loader (‚≠ê41) - Enable HMR for Vue.js components with JSX render functions.
  • vue-page-stack (‚≠ê747) - Routing and navigation for your Vue SPA. Vue ÂçïÈ°µÂ∫îÁî®ÂØºËà™ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®
  • vue-socket.io-extended (‚≠ê625) - Socket.io bindings for Vue.js and Vuex

Components & Libraries / Integrations

  • vue-recaptcha (‚≠ê892) - Google reCAPTCHA component for Vue.js
  • vuefire (‚≠ê4) - Firebase for VueJS and Vuex
  • vue-gtag (‚≠ê905) - Global Site Tag plugin for Vue

Components & Libraries / Dev Tools

  • Storybook - The UI Development Environment. works with v3.2+ later.
  • Font Awesome Finder - Chrome extension to search, preview and choose Font Awesome icons and copy the selected icon HTML code & Unicode to clipboard.
  • Bit (‚≠ê18k) - Manage and reuse vue components between projects. Easily isolate and share components from any project without changing its source code, organize curated collections and install in different projects.
  • Vuex CheatSheet - Complete Interactive Vuex API.
  • vue-styleguidist (‚≠ê2.5k) - A style guide generator for Vue components with a living style guide.
  • vuese (‚≠ê1.7k) - One-stop solution for vue component documentation.
  • vue-hubble (‚≠ê12) - A better way to select elements for UI testing in Vue.
  • Vue Testing Library (‚≠ê1.1k) - Simple and complete testing utilities that encourage good testing practices. Based on DOM Testing Library and built upon the official Vue Test Utils.
  • Vim Vue (‚≠ê1.3k) - Syntax Highlight for Vue.js components.
  • Vue VSCode Snippets (‚≠ê1.3k) - Snippets that will supercharge your Vue workflow.
  • Vue.js support for WebStorm (‚≠ê2.2k), IntelliJ IDEA, PhpStorm, PyCharm & RubyMine ‚Äì official Vue.js support by JetBrains
  • Vue Mode (‚≠ê334) - Emacs major mode for vue.js.

Components & Libraries / Scaffold

  • ScaffoldHub.io - Generate full Vue applications with SQL, MongoDB or Firebase Firestore databases.
  • VuePlay - Generate disposable Vue playgrounds in seconds. Allows you to test things quickly.
  • Mevn-CLI (‚≠ê826) - Light speed setup for MEVN stack based apps.
  • vue-enterprise-boilerplate (‚≠ê7.8k) - An ever-evolving, very opinionated architecture and dev environment for new Vue SPA projects using Vue CLI 3.
  • vue-starters-directory - Search for available scaffold projects and starter kits for VueJS. Features search and github stats are available.

Components & Libraries / Prerendering

  • vue-genesis (‚≠ê624) - üî•Micro front end, micro service and lightweight solution based on Vue SSRüî•

items.title: Awesome Vue Updates on Jan 02, 2019
items.content_text:
### Resources / Examples

*   [Vue 2048 (Vue + Webpack)](https://pengfu.github.io/vue-2048/) by [@pengfu](https://github.com/pengfu): Popular 2048-Game implemented using Vue,Webpack,Sass,ES6
*   [**easy-vue**](https://github.com/TIGERB/easy-vue) a easy example using the vue to implement easy web with vue 2.0, vuex 2.0, vue-router 2.0, vue-infinite-scroll 2.0, vue-progressbar 2.0 by [TIGERB](https://github.com/tigerb)
*   [Vue.js with Sails.js example project (‚≠ê296)](https://github.com/ndabAP/vue-sails-example) - This project is for those who are new to single-page applications and want to learn through a real example.
*   [**Vue.js & Pyramid web framework app**](https://github.com/eddyekofo94/pyramidVue.git) - A boilerplate using Pylons Pyramid webframework backend Vuejs webpack2, vue-router, yarn(packet manager)
*   [vue-feathers-chat (‚≠ê49)](https://github.com/ErickPetru/vue-feathers-chat) A sample realtime chat made with Vue in frontend and Feathers in backend, but using just Socket.IO-Client for the communication
*   [vue-xplan (‚≠ê316)](https://github.com/JackGit/xplan/) A rotating earth demo page created with Vue and three.js
*   [**vueSocketChatRoom**](https://github.com/Chanran/vueSocketChatroom) A socket chat room using vue2.x,vuex2.x,vue-router2.x,vux2.x,socket.io
*   [vue-tetris (Use Vue, Vuex, Immutable to code Tetris)](http://binaryify.github.io/vue-tetris/) by [@Binaryify](https://github.com/Binaryify): Use Vue, Vuex, Immutable to code Tetris.
*   [route-planner-vue](https://kasheftin.github.io/route-planner-vue/) by [@Kasheftin](https://github.com/Kasheftin): The tool for planning routes with multiple sortable layers, draggable directions, markers and shapes on google map.
*   [Vue Weather Notifier (‚≠ê199)](https://github.com/sdras/vue-weather-notifier) A small sample animation app with SVG and Vuex
*   [koa-vue-notes-web (‚≠ê199)](https://github.com/johndatserakis/koa-vue-notes-web) - A fleshed-out SPA using Koa 2.3 on the backend and Vue 2.4 on the frontend. Includes fully featured user-authentication components, CRUD actions for the user's notes, and Vuex store modules.
*   [vue-vuex-todomvc (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/bahmutov/vue-vuex-todomvc) - Example TodoMVC Vue.js app with Vuex store and server backend via REST and full set of E2E tests using [Cypress.io](https://www.cypress.io/) test runner.

### Projects Using Vue.js / Open Source

*   [npmcharts.com (‚≠ê163)](https://github.com/cheapsteak/npmcharts.com) - Compare npm packages and spot download trends.
*   [Koel (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/phanan/koel) - A personal music streaming server that works.
*   [astralapp (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/astralapp/astral) - Organize Your GitHub Stars With Ease.
*   [PJ Blog (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/jcc/blog) - Open source blog built with Laravel and Vue.js.
*   [OpenAPI 3 viewer (‚≠ê94)](https://github.com/koumoul-dev/openapi-viewer) - Browse and test a REST API described with the OpenAPI 3.0 Specification
*   [nativescript-vue (‚≠ê5.6k)](https://github.com/rigor789/nativescript-vue) - A Vue.js implementation of the NativeScript renderer.
items.content_html:
Resources / Examples

  • Vue 2048 (Vue + Webpack) by @pengfu: Popular 2048-Game implemented using Vue,Webpack,Sass,ES6
  • easy-vue a easy example using the vue to implement easy web with vue 2.0, vuex 2.0, vue-router 2.0, vue-infinite-scroll 2.0, vue-progressbar 2.0 by TIGERB
  • Vue.js with Sails.js example project (‚≠ê296) - This project is for those who are new to single-page applications and want to learn through a real example.
  • Vue.js & Pyramid web framework app - A boilerplate using Pylons Pyramid webframework backend Vuejs webpack2, vue-router, yarn(packet manager)
  • vue-feathers-chat (‚≠ê49) A sample realtime chat made with Vue in frontend and Feathers in backend, but using just Socket.IO-Client for the communication
  • vue-xplan (‚≠ê316) A rotating earth demo page created with Vue and three.js
  • vueSocketChatRoom A socket chat room using vue2.x,vuex2.x,vue-router2.x,vux2.x,socket.io
  • vue-tetris (Use Vue, Vuex, Immutable to code Tetris) by @Binaryify: Use Vue, Vuex, Immutable to code Tetris.
  • route-planner-vue by @Kasheftin: The tool for planning routes with multiple sortable layers, draggable directions, markers and shapes on google map.
  • Vue Weather Notifier (‚≠ê199) A small sample animation app with SVG and Vuex
  • koa-vue-notes-web (‚≠ê199) - A fleshed-out SPA using Koa 2.3 on the backend and Vue 2.4 on the frontend. Includes fully featured user-authentication components, CRUD actions for the user's notes, and Vuex store modules.
  • vue-vuex-todomvc (‚≠ê47) - Example TodoMVC Vue.js app with Vuex store and server backend via REST and full set of E2E tests using Cypress.io test runner.

Projects Using Vue.js / Open Source

  • npmcharts.com (‚≠ê163) - Compare npm packages and spot download trends.
  • Koel (‚≠ê17k) - A personal music streaming server that works.
  • astralapp (‚≠ê3.4k) - Organize Your GitHub Stars With Ease.
  • PJ Blog (‚≠ê2.9k) - Open source blog built with Laravel and Vue.js.
  • OpenAPI 3 viewer (‚≠ê94) - Browse and test a REST API described with the OpenAPI 3.0 Specification
  • nativescript-vue (‚≠ê5.6k) - A Vue.js implementation of the NativeScript renderer.
